area: For Coastal areas up to 60 nautical miles from Lerwick, Shetland (18)
warning: A weather front over Shetland Waters will weaken during Friday with a ridge of high pressure building from the east.

forecast.wind: Cyclonic becoming southeasterly 3 to 5, but variable 2 or 3 for a time in west
forecast.weather: Rain and mist, becoming mainly fair
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first
